item.title: SpaceMarmots Roadmap Updated
item.description: Hey Everyone Just wanted to share our updated project plan. We are still ahead of schedule, and are approaching most of our baseline goals.

item.title: Groundhog day announcement
item.description: Hey everyone quick update. The team is hard at work on the project, and we are going to be releasing the details of the Groundhog Day Marmotverse event very shortly.

item.title: Next pre-sales will be on 25.01.2022
item.description: Hi everyone We are happy to announce the details of the next pre-sale of Space Marmots NFTs.

item.title: First marmot on testnet10
item.description: Hey everyone The Marmotverse has successfully encoded a complete Marmot onto the Chia Testnet10 blockchain.

item.title: SpaceMarmots Roadmap Released
item.description: Hey everyone we have the first version of our project plan / roadmap ready for release.

item.title: SpaceMarmots discord reaches 350 members
item.description: 350 members in the discord! Team marmot is working hard to get the project launched asap.

item.title: SpaceMarmots Premium Token is now listed on hash.green
item.description: Hello everyone we are excited to announce that Hashgreen has listed the Space Marmots Premium (SM1) token on their decentralized exchange service.

item.title: SpaceMarmots Premium Token pre-sales Event
item.description: Do we need this post, do we want to link to tcp or do we copy their article or write something on our own?

item.title: SpaceMarmots whitepaper release
item.description: Our whitepaper with additional information about the amazing SpaceMarmots has been released.

item.title: Whitepaper
item.description: MarmotVerse Whitepaper INTRODUCTION The Marmotverse On-Chain Non-Fungible Token (NFT) project will be the premiere Art project and exclusive NFT-ownership club on the Chia blockchain.
